summary: A wrapper class that aggregates several ControlNetModel instances to provide multiple conditioning signals to a UNet during the denoising stage of diffusion pipelines. It forwards calls in a way that mimics a single ControlNetModel, while handling loading and saving of the grouped models.
business_intent: Enable developers to apply multiple control signals simultaneously in diffusion-based image generation, improving flexibility and control over the output without altering the underlying UNet architecture.
